name: Fire Essence
description: A volatile essence brimming with thermal energy. Core ingredient for fire-type monsters.

name: Water Essence
description: A flowing essence infused with aquatic power. Essential for water-type monsters.

name: Nature Essence
description: A verdant essence pulsing with life force. Key component for nature-type monsters.

name: Neutral Essence
description: A balanced essence with no elemental affinity. Versatile ingredient for hybrid monsters.

name: Shadow Essence
description: A dark essence emanating mysterious energy. Required for shadow-type monsters.

name: Light Essence
description: A radiant essence glowing with holy power. Needed for light-type monsters.
